column5: Last weekend I was on the bay of quinte fishing walleye with Lloyd, Paul and Ralph it was a great time as always, the weather sucked the wind blew us off the lake friday. but we got fish I always like watching Lloyd cut up fish so here is a video on how he does it
Great job. Y bones gone too And legal to store. Well done!
Nice job. Thats quite the knife he uses too.  S.
it sure is and he uses it just like any normal skinny  fillet knife , and he is even quicker when there isnt a camera shoved in his face
Nice knifemenship. I slice the same way now on bigger fish. I find it easier then filleting.
Right on! I'm booked for a full day with Lloyd on the 22nd, hopefully the bite is on!
He sure makes it look easy. I filet the same way. Probably takes me more than twice as long for each fish. Good job. Thanks for sharing the video.
Nice technique and slick with those cheeks. Never seen anyone filet with a mini machete before...
yeah he sure is good with it  I think he was a chef at Benihana restaurant lol
I've used a similar knife slabbing.  Not sure why nobody else has? It's similar to an electric blade.  Nice technique! Not my way but everyone has their own methods?  Ps. Mmmmmm walleye cheeks!!!!
